text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the parties to an agreement may amend the agreement by mutual consent.

section.section:
The parties to an agreement may not amend the agreement unless:
there has been a public hearing on the proposed amendment; and
the district council or County Executive, as appropriate, approves any substantial amendment.
A county planning board may not amend an agreement unless the county planning board determines that the proposed amendment is consistent with the Commission's general plan.
